content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
My lights are flickering and some outlets aren't working. I need someone to come fix this.
I'm sorry you're having trouble with your electricity. May I have your name to get things started?
Thank you, Margaret. Can you please provide your address so we can confirm you're within our service area?
Thank you. Could you please provide the full address, including street, city, and zip code?
Why do you need all that? It's just 123 Treehill, everyone knows it!
I want to make sure our team can locate your address without any confusion. Could you please tell me the city and zip code along with your street address?
I apologize for any frustration. I am having trouble processing the address information provided. Let me connect you to a human operator to assist you further.
reason: AI unable to successfully gather valid address from customer

content: Hi Margaret, this is Joe from XYZ Home Services. I see there’s been some difficulty confirming your address. Could you let me know which city you’re in? That will really help us make sure our technician can find you quickly.
